block.p: A child, above, was rushed into the main hospital in the northern Israeli town of Nahariya after the militant group Hezbollah fired a rocket barrage from southern Lebanon.

In the second day of heavy shooting across the border by Hezbollah, an apartment building in Nahariya took a direct hit and burst into flames. One woman was killed on the balcony of her apartment in another building. A man also died in the town of Safad. Hezbollah launched more than 120 rockets, the Israeli military said.
A child, above, was rushed into the main hospital in the northern Israeli town of Nahariya after the militant group Hezbollah fired a rocket barrage from southern Lebanon.
